programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Don Chinjao continues to provoke Luffy, hoping to gain revenge against the grandson of his sworn enemy, Garp! But as the argument continues, Luffy risks having his cover blown, and his identity revealed! Meanwhile, the battle in Block B rages.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!

programme.title: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!

programme.title: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!

programme.title: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!

programme.title: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!

programme.title: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Pirate! Don Chin Jao!

programme.title: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!

programme.title: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chin Jao!

programme.title: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!

programme.title: Rebecca's deep bonds with the one-legged toy soldier are revealed! Her lineage can be traced to the previous ruler of Dressrosa - and her eternal bond with the damaged toy is linked to the violent overthrow of that regime by none other than Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage - only to be scolded by an unlikely supporter. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats start to reassemble to deal with the attack on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!

programme.title: Doflamingo recounts for Law the surprising history of the Don Quixote Family, while Nami and the others battle the insane and powerful artist, Giolla! Her ultimate attack renders them incapacitated, and prompts the betrayal of one of their closest allies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand! Only the most cunning of tricks could save Law's plan to hand Caesar over to Nami & the others! Meanwhile, the Sunny falls into danger again, & the battle for Block D heats up in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beautiful Sword! Cavendish of the White Horse!

programme.title: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault! With barely enough time to save the crew, plans change and send the Sunny on a new mission -- but will it be able to get underway?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Clash! Sanji vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Law & Doflamingo are embroiled in a heated showdown which triggers Momonosuke's memories of Doflamingo's cruelty from the first time they met; meanwhile, after a tearful fanboy conversation Zoro finally gets to see Luffy but all eyes are fixed on Rebecca.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebecca's Special Attack! Last-Ditch Sword Dance!

programme.title: Bartolomeo searches the Colosseum for Luffy but stumbles upon the medical center for the losers of the battles in the ring, but is everything at this center as it seems? Meanwhile, Rebecca has to fend off Rolling Logan's vicious bone-crushing grip attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Most Violent Fighter! Logan vs. Rebecca!

programme.title: The losers of the Colosseum battle who are being held below the infirmary have a surprising person in their midst! But do they have a clue as to their terrifying fate? Meanwhile, the Tontatta Kingdom's history is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Surprise! The True Identity of the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: Bartolomeo finally finds Luffy and starts to lead him to Zoro, while the toy soldier begins to tell the heart-breaking story of how Doflamingo cheated the Riku dynasty out of their control of Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Horrible Past! The Secret of Dressrosa!

programme.title: As the toy soldier's story continues, the sad fate of King Riku and his army, and his daughter Princess Viola, is revealed as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. And all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Nightmare! The Tragic Night of Dressrosa!

programme.title: Zoro, Kin'emon, and Luffy are reunited again, but little do they know that their reunion is being monitored by a potential threat! Meanwhile, the battle rages on between Doflamingo and Law as these two powerhouses clash.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law but Navy Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The Navy is in hot pursuit as a ship approaches with unexpected visitors from the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!

programme.title: After revealing the horrible history of Dressrosa, Toy Soldier now shares their plan to liberate the Tontatta Kingdom and bring down the Doflamingo Family, Operation SOP. Luffy bumps into a heavily-wounded Bellamy and Bartolomeo
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace's Will!

programme.title: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!

programme.title: As the contenders for the battle of Block D dwindle to only thirty, Rebecca has her hands full with the menacing Suleiman the Beheader! All hope seems lost that she can take him down and move on to the finals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Burning Passion! Rebecca vs. Suleiman!

programme.title: The battle for Block D comes to a shocking end and the winner that emerges from the cloud of dust stuns the audience even more! Meanwhile, Luffy, Zoro, Kin'emon, and Wicka of the Tontatta Tribe are about to reach the lift to the palace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Match?! A Surprising Result of Block D!

programme.title: Viola, aka Violet, once a great princess of the Dressrosa family, shows Luffy & the others a secret entrance into the palace which avoids the use of the heavily-guarded lift. In the palace's Suit Chamber, Navy Admiral Fujitora reveals his plans.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Admiral's Decision! Fujitora vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: The final round at the Corrida Colosseum finally begins, as Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the Flare-Flare Fruit! As the stakes escalate, can one champion beat the others & snatch the fruit from the Colosseum's newest hazard?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Final Round Starts! Diamante the Hero Shows Up!

programme.title: Luffy and his group continue their ascent towards Doflamingo's inner sanctum, but standing in their way is an executive of the family whose power is so strong moving past him seems impossible! Meanwhile, Cavendish learns the dark secrets of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Moving Castle! The Top Executive Pica Rises Up!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in New York City to steal a pinball machine made of solid gold. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko board a casino cruise ship and discover that they'll need Goemon's Zantetsuken sword to pull off the heist.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.
programme.sub-title: Code Name is The Star of Alaska

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.
programme.sub-title: The Name of the Cocktail Is Revenge

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Last Action Hero, (1993, Adventure)
programme.desc: Action-adventure superstar Arnold Schwarzenegger bursts through the screen as a larger-than-life movie hero in this nonstop adventure from acclaimed director John McTiernan (Predator, Die Hard). Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: The Gambler II (Part 2), (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Brady Hawkes, Billy Montana, and Jeremiah Hawkes are on a train bound for a huge gambling event when the train is taken over by a gang of vicious killers in search of money. As ransom, the gang takes young Jeremiah hostage.

programme.title: The Gambler III (Part 1), (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Brady Hawkes and Billy Montana join forces once again in this new adventure. This time around their goal is to help the Sioux fight the government and get the supplies they need.

programme.title: The Gambler III (Part 2), (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Brady Hawkes and Billy Montana join forces once again in this new adventure. This time around their goal is to help the Sioux fight the government and get the supplies they need.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 1), (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns (Part 2), (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The Gambler Brady Hawkes is back and he's about to lose his primary means of livelihood, when a law banning gambling is about to be passed.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: War Of The Wildcats, (1943, Drama)
programme.desc: A confident oil baron and a determined cowboy are rivals for Oklahoma land and oil rights, and for the love of a pretty schoolteacher. The cowboy acts on behalf of the Indians, on whose land the oil is discovered.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Drama)

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruéis vikings vai à Grã-Bretanha com a intenção de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa náufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se até chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operação Zodíaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos místicos - 12 cabeças de bronze dos animais do zodíaco chinês.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Após se tornar alvo de seu irmão mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irmã e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vários problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendário cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristãos chegam a uma ilha remota com a intenção de converter os aldeões pagãos à sua religião. O primeiro busca conquistá-los com compreensão e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidação e na violência. À medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldeões devem decidir de que lado estão, e os homens, até onde estão dispostos a ir e quanto sangue será derramado.

programme.title: A Saga Viking

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial soviético, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermínio de Sobibór, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A Última Cruzada
